sources.title: I Am a Camera
sources.description: Title: I Am a Camera Summary: In Weimar-era Berlin, an aspiring writer strikes up a friendship with a vivacious, penniless singer. Directed by: Henry Cornelius Actors: Julie Harris, Laurence Harvey, Shelley Winters Production Company: Romulus Films Release Date: 21 July 1955 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 In Weimar-era Berlin, an aspiring writer strikes up a friendship with a vivacious, penniless singer.

metadata.Plot: In Weimar-era Berlin, an aspiring writer strikes up a friendship with a vivacious, penniless singer.
metadata.Writer: John Van Druten, Christopher Isherwood, John Collier
